Hey Robert, could you try applying the patch for bug 160669 to see if that fixes this.
Yeah, we'll try that out, thanks
Thanks for checking.  Yeah referencedComponent.getArchiveName() should not be returning null either.

Created an attachment (id=54092)
patch

I've been unable to reproduce the NPE.  I've looked through the code and it seems the only place the archiveName would actually be set to null is where you mentioned in VirtualComponent.  And the only way this seems like it would happen is if the component file is messed up (I was able to trip that by first importing a linked utility jar into the EAR and then hand editing the component file to remove its archiveName).  Rather than protecting against the archiveName from being set to null in VirtualComponent, I think a better fix would be to protect against tripping the NPE in J2EEModuleVirtualComponent.  Please give this fix a try.
Hey Robert could you take a look at the attached patch to see if it helps.
code checked into both 1.5.3 and 2.0 streams
*** Bug 168880 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
